page.title: 11BOGYOCH TRANSPORT CO LTD
page.content:
{Bogyoch transport}is a{lorry busines which is run by{Mr Anderson.}He has been driving{lorries}for a very long time. {Bogyoch transport}sometimes has trouble finding work. Normally it gets a load of{turnips}or{potatoes.}It also takes live chickens into{Banff}to get prepared for the shops. The{company has had 6 lorries but just now it has only 4. There are two{DAFS}and two {ERFS.}The{company}is about a mile from the{school.}They have employed three {drivers.}The drivers have slight problems sometimes with thier{trucks. When this happens the drivers sort them,themselves or put the lorries to Turriff for repair by{John Duncan who also sorts vans and tractors.
{KEITH ANDERSON (Aged 10)
